text:
@SpeakerPelosi 1. Closing the door to China. 
2. Closing the door to the EU
3. Correctly Managing not only the fallout of Covid19, but also managing panic and economy. 
Yes, Trump isn’t someone who says the right consultant vetted lines. But he acts. And he delivers. He is doing very well.
